Text: Can you upload some recent lalaloopsy, sofia the first, and peter rabbit. Thanks love your work!

@sultan14 I accept suggestions. If you want something just put a comment on my latest torrent and I see what I can do.

@autmadchris All episodes of Sofia the First are up, the next airs Friday 26. I'm not buying more episodes of Peter Rabbit and Lalaloopsy because of the low number of downloads, but if someone else release I'll upload here.
